title: The Science of Hiccups
description: What are hiccups? Where do they come from? And most importantly, how do we get rid of them?  The Science of Hiccups provides students with a look inside the body to see what causes hiccups  and information about what might be done to cure them. The book can also be used to teach students how to determine cause-and-effect relationships as well as how to properly use dashes.
meta: Cause and Effect : Understand cause-and-effect relationships
Consonant Blends : Identify final consonant -ct and -sm blends
Dash : Identify and use dashes correctly
Suffixes : Identify and use suffixes -ed and -ing

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
